body:
A lot of start-up founders fear sharing their tips & tricks worried that their ideas may get stolen. 

Yet competition never brings down a startup. 

It's usually always internal like poor execution, non-existent product-market fit, insufficient marketing or lack of drive.

I've dealt with poor sleep for many years. As someone who's excited & energetic, I had a hard time going to sleep. And as a startup founder, I've had a hard time staying asleep.

Today I sleep ~8 hours, and almost every aspect of life is better. Here is an ordered list of tips:

Need podcast recommendations for a long trip this afternoon. Any tips?

Prefer podcasts about starting your own business, awesome startups, new ideas, investing, motivation, productivity. #podcast

Startup tip: Don't worry about a unique idea, worry about solving problems.‼️
Ideas will follow. 💯

many of our startup decisions began with experiments 

1️⃣ built a fractional remote team - experiment

2️⃣ launched a functional product in 4 wks - experiment

3️⃣ generated traction with $0 marketing - experiment

founder tip : we're all making it up as we go ☺

• Amazon's business monopoly
• Time management tips
• NFTs for content creators 
• Startup building
• Understanding money

 🧵 My 7 favorite tweets of the week:

The best way to set your company up for #fundraising #success is to build relationships with #investors. I’ll let you in on a little secret… always ask for advice! This allows you to project your big vision while simultaneously showing your soft underbelly. 👏 #startuptips

What did @zomato do better than @swiggy_in, @ubereats in terms of marketing? 

A Thread on how @zomato used the power of #Storytelling to encourage orderers to tip the delivery guys. 
#branding #marketing #startup

Your startup has more than 5 people

Here's 18 things you can do in 2022 to screw it up

Want your startup to end 2022 weaker than when you started?

Follow these tips

🧵 (ya, I know)

I recently took up a new position. I'm officially the COO of all of my ventures.

Being the Chief Otp Officer puts a lot of responsibility on my shoulders and I hope I'll be able to do justice to all my businesses and startups in my new role.

Any COO got any tips for me?

Any good tips for data recovery from a HDD? 

My side internal HDD (WD Blue) failed and had to remove it from the system to make it startup normally. The problem was a "SMART Failure Predicted".
@Startup_Canada @EssentialHRCan @Kaylamisabelle @buyandsellabiz @vanessateranm @thnqninjas How hard / easy is it to build a team when you’ve only met over zoom? Any tips?

Quick Tip 💡

your customers don't need "nice features" ✨to try your product if your startup solves their core problem🎯

So every crypto startup is just free labor for USG to further refine protocols until they’re efficient enough for the on-chain CBDC linked to your ID? And every bar tip you’ll ever make will be on the public ledger? Sick
Startup tip: hire generalists with an entrepreneurial mindset.
10 actionable marketing tips you can use right now to get more startup customers and increase sales:

What is the one thing you look while hiring for your startup?

#business #startup #arunpage #tips #Marketing #entrepreneur #entrepreneurship #Inspiration

I am Thinking of Starting a 100 Day Tech Startup Challenge. 😎

The Project will be very Simple. Let's see which Direction He is Going. 🤷‍♂️

Any Tips or Tools that will Help me Focus and Complete the Challenge Successfully? 🤔

A tip for brands startups, if you know you don’t have a fat budget for Out-Of-Home, don’t buy digital boards. Static boards located at high traffic areas deliver more OTS. If you keep it enough, people will start using your board to give direction. “Near the Bumpa board in Ikoyi”
My biggest tip for startups, please do server validation as much as possible. I just got free access to a paid subscription by changing parameters and I'm damn not proud of it 🤦🏾‍♂️🤦🏾‍♂️

Fintech startups seem to be selling data to external parties

I registered to one such website & started getting continuous calls

Today some one said they give equity tips, I asked if they are @SEBI_India registered

His response was what is SEBI, I give NSE 🤣🤣

Stay cautious

📍Startup tip - Focus on understanding customers pain/Requirement and offer him solution on it, Sell solutions not product 📍
#startups

📍 Startup Tip 📍
 The harder part is not to build a community, but to keep your audience hooked!
